blocks.name: ressprs
blocks.content: The restriction of a proset is a proset. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  mpbi2and((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ((c0[|`s]c1)∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base `(c0[|`s]c1)), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base `(c0[|`s]c1)), ∀(hs2 ∈(Base `(c0[|`s]c1)),(hs0[(le `(c0[|`s]c1))]hs0 ∧((hs0[(le `(c0[|`s]c1))]hs1 ∧ hs1[(le `(c0[|`s]c1))]hs2)→ hs0[(le `(c0[|`s]c1))]hs2)))))), (c0[|`s]c1)∈ 𝕌, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs0[(le ` c0)]hs0 ∧((hs0[(le ` c0)]hs1 ∧ hs1[(le ` c0)]hs2)→ hs0[(le ` c0)]hs2))))))

  jca(((((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧ hs2 ∈ c1), c0 ∈ Proset, hs0 ∈ c2)

  istos(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4)
  rspc2va(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1)), wo(wbr(c1, c4, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c4, c1)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs0)), wbr(c1, c4, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c4, c1))

}

  tleile(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  syl6rbb(wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1))), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wa(wo(wbr(c1, c5, c3), wbr(c3, c5, c1)), wn(wbr(c3, c5, c1))))

thm tlt3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), w3o(wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1)))

  tlt2(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c0), c4)
  orbi1d(w3a(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1), wo(wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3)))
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wb(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3), wo(wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3))), wcel(c0, cpo))
  tospos(c0)
  syl6bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3), wo(wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c4, c3)), wo(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wceq(c1, c3)))
  pleval2(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cple, c0), c4)

  pleval2(c0, c1, c2, c3, (le ` c0), c4)

  orcom(c1[c4]c3, c1 = c3)

thm trleile(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wo(wbr(c1, c4, c3), wbr(c3, c4, c1)), wo(wbr(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c3), wbr(c3, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c1)))

  orbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c3), wbr(c3, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3), wbr(c3, cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), c3), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)), wbr(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c3))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, ctos), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wbr(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

  brin(c3, cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c1)

  breqi(c3, c4, c1, cin(cfv(cple, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))

thm trleile(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Toset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3 ∨ c3[c4]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Toset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c4]c3 ∨ c3[c4]c1), (c1[((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))]c3 ∨ c3[((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))]c1))

  tleile(c0, c1, c2, c3, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  orbi12d((c0 ∈ Toset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))]c3, c3[((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))]c1, c1[(le ` c0)]c3, c3[(le ` c0)]c1)

  sylibr((c0 ∈ Toset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c1[(c2 × c2)]c3, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  brxp(c1, c2, c2, c3)
  rbaib(c1[(c2 × c2)]c3, c1[((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2))]c3, c1[(le ` c0)]c3)
  brin(c1, (le ` c0), (c2 × c2), c3)

  sylibr((c0 ∈ Toset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c3[(c2 × c2)]c1, (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  ancomd((c0 ∈ Toset ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)

  breqi(c1, c4, c3, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))
  breqi(c3, c4, c1, ((le ` c0)⋂(c2 × c2)))

blocks.name: toslub
blocks.content: In a toset, the lowest upper bound ` lub ` , defined for partial orders is the supremum, ` sup ( A , B , .< ) ` , defined for total orders. (these are the set.mm definitions: lowest upper bound and supremum are normally synonymous). Note that those two values are also equal if such a supremum does not exist: in that case, both are equal to the empty set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Feb-2018.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Sep-2018.)

  3syl(w0, wceq(csup(c1, c2, ccnv(c3)), crio(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(c3), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c3), cv(hs0)), wrex(hs3, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), ccnv(c3), cv(hs3)))))))), wcel(c0, ctos), wor(ccnv(c3), c2))

thm tosglb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((glb ` c0)` c1)= inf(c1, c2, c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(lt ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Toset)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(((glb ` c0)` c1), inf(c1, c2, c3), sup(c1, c2, `' c3), w0)
  3eqtr4d(((glb ` c0)` c1), sup(c1, c2, `' c3), iota(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c0)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c0)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c0)]hs0)))), iota(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[`' c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[`' c3]hs0 → ∃(hs3 ∈ c1, hs1[`' c3]hs3))))), w0)
  riotabidva(hs0, c2, w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c0)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c0)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c0)]hs0))), (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[`' c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[`' c3]hs0 → ∃(hs3 ∈ c1, hs1[`' c3]hs3)))))
  tosglblem(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c2, c1, (le ` c0), c3, c0, w0)
  glbval(hs0, hs1, hs2, (glb ` c0), c1, c2, c0, (le ` c0), ctos, w0, (∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c0)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c0)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c0)]hs0))))
  eqid((glb ` c0))
  biid((∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs0[(le ` c0)]hs1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, hs2[(le ` c0)]hs1)→ hs2[(le ` c0)]hs0))))
  3syl(w0, sup(c1, c2, `' c3)= iota(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0[`' c3]hs1)∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs1[`' c3]hs0 → ∃(hs3 ∈ c1, hs1[`' c3]hs3))))), c0 ∈ Toset, `' c3 ≺ c2)
  sylib(c0 ∈ Toset, `' c3 ≺ c2, c3 ≺ c2)
  simpld(c0 ∈ Toset, c3 ≺ c2, (= |` c2)⊆(le ` c0))
  ibi(c0 ∈ Toset, (c3 ≺ c2 ∧(= |` c2)⊆(le ` c0)))
  tosso(c0, ctos, c3, c2, (le ` c0))
  eqid((le ` c0))
  cnvso(c3, c2)
  supval2(hs0, hs1, hs3, c1, c2, `' c3, `' c3 ≺ c2)
  id(`' c3 ≺ c2)
  a1i(w0, sup(c1, c2, `' c3)= inf(c1, c2, c3))
  eqcomi(sup(c1, c2, `' c3), inf(c1, c2, c3))
  df-inf(c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(`' c3)
  diff.hs1.c(`' c3)
  diff.hs3.c(`' c3)
}
